courseName: Advanced Engineering Management (with Specialist Pathways) - MSc
description: The Advanced Engineering Management Programme (AEMP) is delivered jointly by the School of Engineering and the Birmingham Business School, combining the expertise and strengths of both schools to offer a high quality, distinctive and flexible course.Â The programme introduces core management concepts in semester one before you select one of four specialist pathways in semester two.
